channel.title: Need help with a few things, not tot easy not too hard
channel.description:
Alright...i need to know the following things
-if i delete an object w\ fedexers tut, will i be able to spawn one there w\ global objects? -how do i make attacking an npc give you xp, and how can i control that xp ammount -how do i make spells require runes -is it possible to make bridges across water? (i doubt it, worth a shot)

item.title: Need help with a few things, not tot easy not too hard
item.dc:creator: @blade9670 blade9670
item.description:
@blade9670 wrote:

pimpscape or jorsscape i guess right???

heres the tutorial on the required runes magixc fix

Search for:

public boolean playerHasItemAmount(int itemID, int itemAmount) { //if(itemID == 0 || itemAmount == 0) return true; playerItemAmountCount = 0; for (int i=0; i<playerItems.length; i++) { if (playerItems[i] == itemID+1) { playerItemAmountCount = playerItemsN[i]; } if(playerItemAmountCount >= itemAmount){ return true;} } //return (itemAmount <= playerItemAmountCount); return true; }

Step 3:
Replace with mine

public boolean playerHasItemAmount(int itemID, int itemAmount) { //if(itemID == 0 || itemAmount == 0) return true; playerItemAmountCount = 0; for (int i=0; i<playerItems.length; i++) { if (playerItems[i] == itemID+1) { playerItemAmountCount = playerItemsN[i]; } if(playerItemAmountCount >= itemAmount){ return true;} } //return (itemAmount <= playerItemAmountCount); return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a few things, not tot easy not too hard
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

-if i delete an object w\ fedexers tut, will i be able to spawn one there w\ global objects?
If want to put an object in place of another, just get the direct coordinates on the object you want replaced, and put the object you want at those exact coordinates with global objects. It will replace the other object.

Read full topic
